S:log-item.D:comment: SOLR-5520: Backports of: - SOLR-4881 (Fix DocumentAnalysisRequestHandler to correctly use EmptyEntityResolver to prevent loading of external entities like UpdateRequestHandler does) - SOLR-3895 (XML and XSLT UpdateRequestHandler should not try to resolve external entities) - SOLR-3614 (Fix XML parsing in XPathEntityProcessor to correctly expand named entities, but ignore external entities)
